      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.graphics.Bitmap detect(android.graphics.Bitmap originalFrame, byte[] outputData)
      detect a BLACK line to follow : scan the firsts rows and calculate the median point of black-ish pixels captures this point in a Queue representing the N last frames, calculate a mean point on these frames and use it to direct the drone
      void setDrone(JumpingSumo mDrone)
      set a JumpingSumo to the detector, needed for it to act on the drone
